1{-# LANGUAGE RecordWildCards #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Arithmetics on decimals.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Type.Decimal.BinaryAb
7  ( -- * Fracle
8    FracleSide (..),
9
10    -- * Binary operator
11    decimalAdd, decimalSum, decimalSub,
12    decimalMul, decimalDiv,
13    decimalQuo, decimalRem,
14  ) where
15
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                   as B
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Decimal.Coder     as D
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Decimal.Decimal   as D
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Decimal.Fraction  as D
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Message           as Msg
21
22
23-- ----------------------  Fracle
24
25-- | Fracle-selection mode in composing decimals.
26data FracleSide
27    = FracleLong       -- ^ Select longer fracle (@+@)
28    | FracleLeft       -- ^ Select left fracle (@.+@)
29    | FracleRight      -- ^ Select right fracle (@+.@)
30    | FracleStrict     -- ^ Check same fracles (@.+.@)
31      deriving (Show, Ord, Eq)
32
33constLeft :: a -> b -> a
34constLeft = const
35
36constRight :: a -> b -> b
37constRight _ y = y
38
39
40-- ----------------------  Type and Higher function
41
42decimalBinAbPlus :: D.BinRatio -> D.BinAbDecimal
43decimalBinAbPlus = D.decimalBinAb (+)
44
45decimalBinAbLeft :: D.BinRatio -> D.BinAbDecimal
46decimalBinAbLeft = D.decimalBinAb constLeft
47
48decimalBinAbRight :: D.BinRatio -> D.BinAbDecimal
49decimalBinAbRight = D.decimalBinAb constRight
50
51
52-- ----------------------  Binary operator
53
54-- | Addition: /x/ + /y/
55decimalAdd :: FracleSide -> D.BinAbDecimal
56decimalAdd FracleLong    = decimalAddLong
57decimalAdd FracleLeft    = decimalBinAbLeft  (+)
58decimalAdd FracleRight   = decimalBinAbRight (+)
59decimalAdd FracleStrict  = decimalAddStrict
60
61-- | Addition with 'FracleLong'.
62decimalAddLong :: D.BinAbDecimal
63decimalAddLong x y = Right $ x + y
64
65decimalAddStrict :: D.BinAbDecimal
66decimalAddStrict d1@D.Decimal { D.decimalFracle = f1 }
67                 d2@D.Decimal { D.decimalFracle = f2 }
68    | f1 == f2   = decimalAddLong d1 d2
69    | otherwise  = Msg.heteroDecimal d1 d2
70
71-- | Add all decimals.
72decimalSum :: [D.Decimal] -> B.Ab D.Decimal
73decimalSum = Right . foldr (+) 0
74
75-- | Subtruction: /x/ - /y/
76decimalSub :: FracleSide -> D.BinAbDecimal
77decimalSub f x y = decimalAdd f x (- y)
78
79-- | Multiplication: /x/ × /y/
80decimalMul :: D.BinAbDecimal
81decimalMul = decimalBinAbPlus (*)
82
83-- | Division: /x/ ÷ /y/
84decimalDiv :: D.BinAbDecimal
85decimalDiv = decimalBinAbPlus (/)
86
87-- | Quotient: integral part of /x/ ÷ /y/
88decimalQuo :: D.BinAbDecimal
89decimalQuo x y = Right $ D.decimalIntPart $ x / y
90
91-- | Remainder: /y/ × fractional part of /x/ ÷ /y/
92decimalRem :: D.BinAbDecimal
93decimalRem x y = Right $ y * D.decimalFracPart (x / y)
94
